I hate to throw one more burden on your already piled
high shoulders, but I think, in the interests of uniformity,
you’d probably better work with Marcus Cohn (or Paul Dobin)
in putting this in the right direction. Clearly, if we’re
going to testify, we are going to have to decide who will do
it, and that person will have to get together some kind of
basic data on the problems involved.
Yours sincerely
Burton Paulu
President
